title: House of Trump Cards? NBA Bubbly Brain Bleach 9.29.20
itunes:title: House of Trump Cards? NBA Bubbly Brain Bleach 9.29.20
description:
In episode 725, Jack and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedy writer and The Dark Weeb co-host Cody Zigler to discuss Trumps taxes, the Trump campaign laundering millions, Brad Parscale, Trump using CDC money to make ads with celebs, Lebron James going to the finals, Jimmy Butler's coffee empire, Great British Baking Show, Korean soft drinks, The Social Network, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. LONG-CONCEALED RECORDS SHOW TRUMP’S CHRONIC LOSSES AND YEARS OF TAX AVOIDANCE
  2. 18 Revelations From a Trove of Trump Tax Records
  3. You Know Who Else Didn't Pay His Income Taxes?
  4. Non-Partisan Watchdog Accuses Trump Campaign Of ‘Laundering’ $170 Million
  5. Brad Parscale made suicidal comments and had physical altercation with wife, she tells police
  6. ‘It’s like every red flag’: Trump-ordered HHS ad blitz raises alarms
  7. Dennis Quaid Voices ‘Outrage’ at ‘Cancel Culture Media’ for Response to COVID PSA (Video)
  8. LeBron James becomes fourth player in NBA history to reach Finals 10 times after helping Lakers advance
  9. Jimmy Butler is building a coffee empire in the NBA bubble
  10. Where is Down Hall? ‘Great British Baking Show’ Season 8 Filming Location
  11. Pop culture: A guide to Korean soft drinks
  12. Mark Zuckerberg rejects his portrayal in The Social Network
  13. WATCH: Anderson .Paak feat. Rick Ross - CUT EM IN (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
